definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: What is heterogeneous batching and how can it help performance?
sentences.chinese: 何为异构批处理且它如何有助于性能提升？

sentences.english: When working in a batch, we set all the parameters from the command line.
sentences.chinese: 当以批处理方式工作时，我们从命令行设置所有参数。

sentences.english: Batch processing was replaced by real-time processing.
sentences.chinese: 于是，实时处理取代了成批处理。

sentences.english: Returns logical name of this batch data stream.
sentences.chinese: 返回此批处理数据流的逻辑名称。

sentences.english: The example below combines the batch and instantaneous validation methods.
sentences.chinese: 下面的示例将批处理和瞬时确认方法结合在一起。

sentences.english: However, some attributes are only updated periodically by batch operations.
sentences.chinese: 然而一些属性只在定期的批处理时进行更新。

sentences.english: Run the batch file again and check the trap receiver.
sentences.chinese: 再次运行批处理文件并检查陷阱接收器。

sentences.english: Has this renderer been statically batched with any other renderers?
sentences.chinese: 这个渲染器有被任何其他渲染器静态批处理？

sentences.english: The biggest gripes are always around rolling back complex batch operations.
sentences.chinese: 最大的苦恼往往是关于回滚复杂的批处理操作。

sentences.english: The Proxy Service pattern can be used to execute batch workloads in parallel.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用代理服务模式并行执行批处理工作负载。

sentences.english: A template is especially useful when redacting forms in batch processing.
sentences.chinese: 模板在批处理修订表格时尤其有用。

sentences.english: I've gotta finish this batch by tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天之前我必须做完这批处理。

sentences.english: Text-based script files can run in the batch mode.
sentences.chinese: 基于文本的脚本文件能以批处理方式运行。

sentences.english: This batch file only installs product updates.
sentences.chinese: 该批处理文件只安装产品更新。

sentences.english: Number of draw-calls, triangles and vertices which were automatically batched by the engine.
sentences.chinese: 绘制调用的数量，引擎会自动批处理三角形和顶点。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
